sentences.sContent: It turns out that Corpora have great advantages in lexicography.
sentences.sContent_eng: It turns out that Corpora have great advantages in lexicography.
sentences.sCn: 语料库在词典编纂中具有强大的优势。

sentences.sContent: Thirty-odd persons' long and distinguished service to lexicography has brought the dictionary within sight of completion.
sentences.sContent_eng: Thirty-odd persons' long and distinguished service to lexicography has brought the dictionary within sight of completion.
sentences.sCn: 余人对词典编纂长期和卓越的贡献使这部词典完成在望。

words.tran: 词汇的；[语] 词典的；词典编纂的

trans.tranOther: the skill, practice, or profession of writing dictionaries
